languages.text: "Если б вы трудились, не щадя живота своего, и в вере были тверды, то и жизнь ваша уподобилась бы тому, что замыслил Император для Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Если б вы трудились, не щадя живота своего, и в вере были тверды, то и жизнь ваша уподобилась бы тому, что замыслил Император для Человечества".

languages.text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Если б вы трудились, не щадя живота своего, и в вере были тверды, то и жизнь ваша уподобилась бы тому, что замыслил Император для Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."
"If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."
"If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."
"If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."
"If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."

languages.text: «Si hubierais trabajado con denuedo y una convicción firme, vuestras vidas se parecerían más a lo que el Emperador quiso para la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Si hubierais trabajado con denuedo y una convicción firme, vuestras vidas se parecerían más a lo que el Emperador quiso para la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「もしあなた方が命を惜しむことなく労苦し、信仰を堅持していたなら、あなた方の人生は皇帝が人類に意図したものと似ていただろう」
languages.original_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「もしあなた方が命を惜しむことなく労苦し、信仰を堅持していたなら、あなた方の人生は皇帝が人類に意図したものと似ていただろう」

languages.text: “如果你们当初不吝惜自己的生命，如果你们当初坚定信仰，那你们此刻本该踏上帝皇为人类指明的道路。”
languages.original_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “如果你们当初不吝惜自己的生命，如果你们当初坚定信仰，那你们此刻本该踏上帝皇为人类指明的道路。”

languages.text: "Wenn ihr gearbeitet hättet und standhaft in eurem Glauben gewesen wärt, würde euer Leben dem entsprechen, was der Imperator für die Menschheit vorsieht."
languages.original_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ihr gearbeitet hättet und standhaft in eurem Glauben gewesen wärt, würde euer Leben dem entsprechen, was der Imperator für die Menschheit vorsieht."

languages.text: « Si vous aviez travaillé sans ménager votre peine et que vous étiez restés inébranlables dans votre foi, vos vies ressembleraient à ce que l'Empereur a voulu pour l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous aviez travaillé sans ménager votre peine et que vous étiez restés inébranlables dans votre foi, vos vies ressembleraient à ce que l'Empereur a voulu pour l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Canınızı dişinize takıp çalışsaydınız ve inancınız bütün olsaydı İmparator'un İnsanlığa layık gördüğü türden bir ömür sürerdiniz."
languages.original_text: "If you had laboured without sparing your lives and had been steadfast in your faith, your lives would resemble what the Emperor intended for Humanity."
